mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

SELECT M.MEM_ID, (SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_WRITER) FROM STORE_RE S WHERE M.MEM_NO = S.REVIEW_WRITER) AS STORE_REVIEW, (SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_WRITER) FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW P WHERE M.MEM_NO = P.REVIEW_WRITER) AS PRODUCT_REVIEW, (SELECT SUM(MPS_RECORD) FROM MPS_POINT MP WHERE M.MEM_NO = MP.MEM_NO) AS MPS_POINT, (SELECT COUNT(MEM_NO) FROM STORE_SCRAP SS WHERE M.MEM_NO = SS.MEM_NO) AS STORE_SCRAP, (SELECT COUNT(F_MNO) FROM FOLLOW F WHERE M.MEM_NO = F.F_MNO) AS FOLLOW FROM MEMBER M WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NICKNAME = #{memNickname}

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_ID , MPS_CATEGORY , MPS_RECORD , MPS_STATUS , SU_DATE FROM MPS_POINT JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY SU_DATE DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT (SELECT STORE_NAME FROM STORE S WHERE SC.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO) AS STORE_NAME, (SELECT STORE_ADDRESS FROM STORE S WHERE SC.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO) AS STORE_ADDRESS, (SELECT AVG(REVIEW_RATE) FROM STORE_RE SR WHERE SR.STORE_NO = SC.STORE_NO) AS RATE FROM STORE_SCRAP SC JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY SCRAP_DATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2
